description: '''Rap rock''' is a music genre that developed from the early to mid-1980s, when [[Hip-hop|hip hop]] [[Disc jockey|DJs]] incorporated [[rock music|rock]] records into their routines and [[rapping|rappers]] began incorporating original and [[sampling (music)|sampled]] rock instrumentation into hip hop music. Rap rock is considered to be rock music in which lyrics are rapped, rather than sung. The genre achieved its greatest success in the late 1990s and early 2000s.
